pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: American Heritage Center, University of Wyoming
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Includes two audio tapes of Stone's radio interviews of 10 producers and actors, including Cecil B. De Mille, Ed Wynne and Eddie Cantor, and other papers relating to her acting and producing careers. Stone was a radio personality in the 1940s. The catalog lists the names of the 10 interviewees but not the dates of the interviews.
